1.title: Moving Forward
1.quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
1.author: Henry Ford

2.title: Law of Life
2.quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
2.author: John F. Kennedy

3.title: I slept and dreamt
3.quote: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
3.author: Rabindranath Tagore

4.title: We all Lie
4.quote: Women lie about their age; men lie about their income.
4.author: William Feather

5.title: Difficulty
5.quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
5.author: Stephen Hawking

6.title: Our prime purpose
6.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
6.author: Dalai Lama

7.title: Love yourself
7.quote: My mama don't like you and she likes every one!. But now I know, I'm better sleeping on my own.
7.author: Justin Bieber
